Hello @all,

 

I like to hide my Business Objects behind a WCF service. The goal is to use the same Business Logic for SL and WPF.

Is the a "Best Practise" how to use Prism/Unity and WCF?

Thanks,

Manullino

Hi Manullino,

Prism does not provide any specific guidance on how to deal with WCF services. However, it was built to provide developers the possibility of Multi-Targeting. The following thread provides some more information that might be useful for you to have a code base as reusable as possible:

  • Choose Silverlight or WPF?

You might also find this post useful as it talks about consuming WCF services from Prism modules.

Please let me know if this helps.

Damian Schenkelman
http://blogs.southworks.net/dschenkelman
